title: 1.16a Supplemental- Sir Edward Hyde, First Earl of Clarendon
itunes:title: 1.16a Supplemental- Sir Edward Hyde, First Earl of Clarendon
description: After serving in Parliament and the courts of both Charles I and Charles II, Edward Hyde wrote a massively influential history of the English Civil Wars.
content:encoded: After serving in Parliament and the courts of both Charles I and Charles II, Edward Hyde wrote a massively influential history of the English Civil Wars.
